overview: Half-pint, small-fry or fun-sized...no matter what you call them, these chicks are hot. ATKingdom presents for your viewing pleasure:  ATK Petites Volume 3, with 7 tiny ladies. From weigh-ins to hardcore action, we try to give you a taste of everything. Watch as Alison towers over Jade in an amazing lesbian action scene. We guarantee these girls are 5'4" (and under) and weigh no more than 110 pounds. Sit back and get ready for some big action in small packages.
title: ATK Petites 3
